items.summary: Download the MP3 from https://image2url.com/r2/default/audio/1770895970075-efc8efc8-d8ca-4014-a506-846ed3573d6b.mp3 and commit it into the repository as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3 so the existing background-music code (getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3')) can load it in production without relying on the external URL at runtime.
